I'm happy to share with you and #useR2020 a little #rstats package I've been working on called {xaringanExtra}. It's full of extensions and add-ons to make your xaringan slides extra fun!

https://t.co/cflHqoUija

Use vacant ggplot2 facets for advertising with {ggbillboard}

p <- ggplot(blah, blah)
img <- grid::rasterGrob(readPNG("whatever.png"), 
               interpolate=TRUE)
billboard(p, img)

https://t.co/MNwiHZ7vt6 #rstats https://t.co/46EaPhkgXj
